Name: App
Description: Abstract App Root

Name: Login
Description: Login for the first time, or log in as returning user

Name: Story
Description: The narrative that sets up the treasure hunt

Name: Newuser
Description: Choose a character to play through the hunt

Name: Puzzle
Description: Contains photo, hint, and "I found it!" button

Name: Treat
Description: Upon completion of puzzle, user receives treat (increased discount) and earns points for leaderboard

Name: Gameover
Description: Congratulations! You finished the hunt. You were the nth finisher.

Name: Leaderboard
Description: Lists usernames and points earned for the player's hunt.

Name: Lifecode
Description: Enter code from vendor to gain a new life

Name: Redeem
Description: Redeem discount code at vendor.  The vendor can see the coupon - and validate it with a mobile device - if they choose.

Name: Dashboard
Description: User home page - lists possible hunts?

Name: Settings
Description: User preferences and settings

Name: Logout
Description: Logout

Name: Admin
Description: Abstract Admin Root

Name: Cities
Description: A list of cities where hunts are

Name: City
Description: A city in which a hunt may (or may not) take place.

Name: Characters
Description: A list of charcter templates used

Name: Character
Description: A character available in a hunt

Name: Locations
Description: A list of locations a hunt might happen in

Name: Location
Description: A location within a city.

Name: Hunts
Description: A list of hunts, taking place in some city

Name: Hunt
Description: A hunt taking place in a city

Name: HuntPlanner
Description: A hunt planner which allows one to easily add/edit puzzles for a hunt

Name: Users
Description: A list of users planing the game (and all their associated meta data)

Name: User
Description: A hunt taking place in a city
